effect.scarlet_violet: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.the_teal_mask: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.legends_za: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.legends_za: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP. More HP is restored when the ground is Grassy Terrain.
